attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm sick to death of being told I must polute the world less so I'm going to be taxed out of my car. 
I use a car for work because my local county council removed the only public transport alternative.
I don't live nearer work because the house prices and my salary aren't compatible.
I don't use a non-poluting car, because although they have them in other countries we can't buy them here.
I don't have a hybrid because the fuel economy isn't that much different to my current car. 
I don't have an economical comuter car + a family car because I'd need to pay 2 lots of car tax, 2 lots of insurance, 2 lots of insurance tax, 2 lots of mot, and I can only drive one car at a time.
I want to be more environmental - but I want the government to make it possible.
